org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value:
# 1. Limpar Ã¡rea de trabalho rm -rf * .git 2>/dev/null || true
# 2. Clonar git clone https://github.com/Gabrielcefetzada/api-pagamento.git .
# 3. Criar Dockerfile completo cat > Dockerfile << 'EOF' FROM php:8.3-cli
# Instalar dependÃªncias RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y git unzip libzip-dev libsqlite3-dev && docker-php-ext-install zip pdo pdo_sqlite
# Instalar Composer RUN curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php && mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer
WORKDIR /var/www/html
# Copiar cÃ³digo COPY . .
# Configurar Laravel e executar testes RUN php -r "file_exists('.env') || copy('.env.example', '.env');" && composer install -q --no-ansi --no-interaction --no-scripts --no-progress --prefer-dist && php artisan key:generate && chmod -R 777 storage bootstrap/cache && mkdir -p database && touch database/database.sqlite
CMD ["sh", "-c", "DB_CONNECTION=sqlite DB_DATABASE=database/database.sqlite php artisan test"] EOF
# 4. Build e execuÃ§Ã£o com DOCKER (sem docker-compose) echo "ðŸš€ Buildando imagem Docker..." docker build -t laravel-test-$(date +%s) .
echo "ðŸ§ª Executando testes..." docker run --rm $(docker images -q laravel-test-* | head -1)
# 5. Limpar echo "ðŸ§¹ Limpando imagens..." docker rmi $(docker images -q laravel-test-* 2>/dev/null) 2>/dev/null || true

execution.script:
pipeline { agent any
stages { stage('Clone and Test') { steps { sh ''' # 1. Limpar Ã¡rea de trabalho rm -rf * .git 2>/dev/null || true
# 2. Clonar git clone https://github.com/Gabrielcefetzada/api-pagamento.git .
# 3. Criar Dockerfile completo cat > Dockerfile << 'EOF' FROM php:8.3-cli
# Instalar dependÃªncias RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y \ git unzip libzip-dev libsqlite3-dev \ && docker-php-ext-install zip pdo pdo_sqlite
# Instalar Composer RUN curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php \ && mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer
WORKDIR /var/www/html
# Copiar cÃ³digo COPY . .
# Configurar Laravel e executar testes RUN php -r "file_exists('.env') || copy('.env.example', '.env');" \ && composer install -q --no-ansi --no-interaction --no-scripts --no-progress --prefer-dist \ && php artisan key:generate \ && chmod -R 777 storage bootstrap/cache \ && mkdir -p database \ && touch database/database.sqlite
CMD ["sh", "-c", "DB_CONNECTION=sqlite DB_DATABASE=database/database.sqlite php artisan test"] EOF
# 4. Build e execuÃ§Ã£o com DOCKER (sem docker-compose) echo "ðŸš€ Buildando imagem Docker..." docker build -t laravel-test-$(date +%s) .
echo "ðŸ§ª Executando testes..." docker run --rm $(docker images -q laravel-test-* | head -1)
# 5. Limpar echo "ðŸ§¹ Limpando imagens..." docker rmi $(docker images -q laravel-test-* 2>/dev/null) 2>/dev/null || true ''' } } } }
